descriptions.description_professions: Online service for comparison of online programming courses in different schools. Comparison of programming online courses - Hexlet Comparator
descriptions.description_certain_school: Overview of {{profession}} courses in popular online schools - Hexlet Comparator
descriptions.description_school: Overview of courses from {{school}}. What professions are there in {{school}}, review and comparison of online school
descriptions.description_comparison: Comparison of courses by profession {{profession}} in online schools {{school_1}} and {{school_2}}. Where to go to study by profession {{profession}}

descriptions.trial: Trial access to the theory. This usually means a number of free courses or lessons
